channel.title: [562]How to change exp rates
channel.description: I know "where" to change them, but I do not know "how" to change them, what numbers exactly do you change, and what is a fast exp rate anyone can suggest.

item.title: [562]How to change exp rates
item.dc:creator: @l2pk_pure l2pk pure
item.description:
@l2pk_pure wrote:

[quote=“Kletzi101, post:1, topic:364062”]I know “where” to change them, but I do not know “how” to change them, what numbers exactly do you change, and what is a fast exp rate anyone can suggest.[/quote]Dude If You Know How To Code Its Easy… make a new account and go hit a “1” on something then run away… look at the skill you trained and look at your current exp… then go to the file and find the skill you trained and look for the exp you got from one hit… and change that to w/e… the # you change it to will be how much exp you get per 1 hit dmg… then multiply that # by 1.5 then that # by 1.5 and so on…

Read full topic
